featuring.content:
The Roblox Developers Conference (RDC) is an invite-only hybrid (in-person and online) event that brings together the most innovative creators from our global community so they can build connections, learn, and share ideas.

Featuring groundbreaking keynote presentations, in-depth breakout sessions, and networking opportunities, RDC is designed to empower you with the knowledge you need to reach your full creative potential on Roblox.
featuring.title: More Than Just a Conference

attend.title:
Attendees Will Have
A Chance To

benefits.description: Meet and network with other experienced creators from around the world
Gain insights into our latest product developments and roadmap
Share feedback and ideas directly with Roblox technology leaders

awards.title: The Roblox Innovation Awards (RIAs) Return, Bigger Than Ever
awards.content:
#### What better way to end our biggest RDC yet than an epic night of celebration?

Join us as we honor the best and brightest in the community at our second annual in-person awards ceremony: the RIAs! You’ll be treated to a sit-down dinner, plus a special after-party where you can mingle with your fellow nominees and winners. Come as you are or dress up in your awards show best – this is one night you won’t want to miss.
